channel.title: CVE Feed for Santesoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Santesoft -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1453|2024-03-01T18:56:40.511Z -- Santesoft -- Sante DICOM Viewer Pro
item.description: In Sante DICOM Viewer Pro versions 14.0.3 and prior, a user must open a malicious DICOM file, which could allow a local attacker to disclose information or execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-1696|2024-03-11T16:51:58.503Z -- Santesoft -- Sante FFT Imaging
item.description: In Santesoft Sante FFT Imaging versions 1.4.1 and prior once a user opens a malicious DCM file on affected FFT Imaging installations, a local attacker could perform an out-of-bounds write, which could allow for arbitrary code execution.
